chinese: 我一有机会就跑步，
english: I try to run when I can.

chinese: 我还骑健身自行车.
english: I use an exercise bike.

chinese: 有氧健身运动主要就是这两种方式.
english: Those are the main aerobic forms of exercise,

chinese: 然后我还，er, 进行哑铃锻炼和做仰卧起坐.
english: then I do, er, dumbbell weights and sit-ups.

chinese: 我每星期跑步或竞走大概，urn,大概三英里, 大约五次.
english: I run or race-walk about, urn, about three miles, about five times a week.

chinese: Um, 除此之外，我还举重，
english: Um, in addition to that I lift weights,

chinese: er, 30到40分钟，每个星期大约四次，
english: er, 30 to 40 minutes about four times a week,

chinese: 每个星期还会有一次是做一个半小时.
english: and for an hour and a half one time a week.

chinese: 我实际上是先跑步，然后去举重，所以...
english: Actually, I run and then I'm going to go and lift weights, so...

chinese: 我想每天大概两小时左右吧.
english: I guess it comes out to be about two hours a day.

chinese: 我是名三项全能运动员，
english: I'm a triathlete,

chinese: 所以我必须接受三个项目的训练.
english: so I have three disciplines that I have to train.

chinese: 这三个项目是骑白行车, 游泳和跑步.
english: for cycling, swimming, and running,

chinese: 所以我一般每天练两个项目.
english: so I try and do two a day.

chinese: 所以我是先把汽车停在城外，
english: So I park outside of the city

chinese: 然后再沿着这条河骑自行车.
english: and bicycle along the river here.

chinese: 然后我发现我在做这项运动的时候，觉得它，er...
english: and I find when I do this, it's, er...

chinese: 非常有益于大脑的健康.
english: very therapeutic for my mind.

chinese: 每个星期有两次我会被从床上拉起来，
english: I get pulled out of bed twice a week and,

chinese: er,在7点到8点之间吧，我们在这儿绕着环形跑道跑步-跑一个小时.
english: er, between seven and eight we do our loop here-it takes an hour.

chinese: 每到周未我们会...
english: And on weekends we try and...

chinese: 当我们这样做了, 我们会去New Hampshire,
english: when we do, we go up to New Hampshire,

chinese: 在那儿的山里徒步.
english: and hike in the hills there.

chinese: 我觉得一个人如果只锻炼而不注合理饮食的话，他不会有健康的身体的.
english: I think with exercise and without the proper diet you're not going to feel good.

chinese: 同样，如果光注意合理饮食而不进行锻炼的话，他的身体也不会好到哪儿去.
english: and with proper diet and without exercise you're not going to feel good.

chinese: Yeah, 如果你每天像我这样锻炼，
english: Yeah, if you do as much training as I do,

chinese: 或者像其他三项全能运动员那样训练的话，
english: or as any triathlete does,

chinese: 你就得好好注意你的饮食.
english: you have to be careful about your diet.

chinese: So,比如说，我每天必须摄入750克碳水化合物，
english: So, for instance, I have to get 750g of carbohydrates in every day,

chinese: um, 这就得吃很多东西.
english: um, which is a lot of food.

chinese: 我试着不要...
english: I try not to...

chinese: 今天跑步时很困难，因为我昨天吃了脂肪食品.
english: When I was running today, it was really hard 'cause I ate fat yesterday.

chinese: 我真的能感觉出有什么不同.
english: I can really tell the difference.

chinese: 使我感觉身体健康，
english: Makes me feel healthy,

chinese: 感觉好像是在为自己做些什么.
english: feel like I'm doing something for myself.

chinese: 这并不容易.
english: It's not easy.
